name: Gravity Space Program
description:
Gravity Space Program is a 2d puzzle game, set in space and based on arcade games like Asteroids. Use gravity force to reach your target and modify it with 4 different lasers: enlarge, shrink, invert or cancel gravity.

Cross space adrift, destroy moons, dodge asteroids, escape from black holes ... Discover different adventures and challenges that will test your imagination.

Features
  • 5 spaceships to unlock.
  • 15 challenging levels
  • Physics simulation based on Sci-Fi movies or series
  • Modern retro-styled arcade gameplay
  • Keyboard controls
